  16. ‌#define CAML_INTERNALS

  18. #include "caml/alloc.h"
  19. #include "caml/custom.h"
  20. #include "caml/domain_state.h"
  21. #include "caml/fail.h"
  22. #include "caml/memory.h"

  24. #include "caml/signals.h"
  25. #include "caml/sync.h"
  26. #include "caml/sys.h"
  27. #include "caml/runtime_events.h"

  29. /* System-dependent part */
  30. #include "sync_posix.h"

  32. /* Mutex operations */

  34. ‌static void caml_mutex_finalize(value wrapper)
  35. {
  36.   sync_mutex_destroy(Mutex_val(wrapper));
  37. }

  39. ‌static int caml_mutex_compare(value wrapper1, value wrapper2)
  40. {
  41.   sync_mutex mut1 = Mutex_val(wrapper1);
  42.   sync_mutex mut2 = Mutex_val(wrapper2);
  43.   return mut1 == mut2 ? 0 : mut1 < mut2 ? -1 : 1;
  44. }

  46. ‌static intnat caml_mutex_hash(value wrapper)
  47. {
  48.   return (intnat) (Mutex_val(wrapper));
  49. }

  51. ‌static const struct custom_operations caml_mutex_ops = {
  52.   "_mutex",
  53.   caml_mutex_finalize,
  54.   caml_mutex_compare,
  55.   caml_mutex_hash,
  56.   custom_serialize_default,
  57.   custom_deserialize_default,
  58.   custom_compare_ext_default,
  59.   custom_fixed_length_default
  60. };

  62. ‌CAMLexport int caml_mutex_lock(sync_mutex mut)
  63. {
  64.   return sync_mutex_lock(mut);
  65. }

  67. ‌CAMLexport int caml_mutex_unlock(sync_mutex mut)
  68. {
  69.   return sync_mutex_unlock(mut);
  70. }

  72. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_mutex_new(value unit)
  73. {
  74.   sync_mutex mut = NULL;
  75.   value wrapper;

  77.   sync_check_error(sync_mutex_create(&mut), "Mutex.create");
  78.   wrapper = caml_alloc_custom(&caml_mutex_ops, sizeof(pthread_mutex_t *),
  79.                               0, 1);
  80.   Mutex_val(wrapper) = mut;
  81.   return wrapper;
  82. }

  84. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_mutex_lock(value wrapper)
  85. {
  86.   CAMLparam1(wrapper);
  87.   sync_retcode retcode;
  88.   sync_mutex mut = Mutex_val(wrapper);

  90.   /* PR#4351: first try to acquire mutex without releasing the master lock */
  91.   if (sync_mutex_trylock(mut) != MUTEX_PREVIOUSLY_UNLOCKED) {
  92.     /* If unsuccessful, block on mutex */
  93.     caml_enter_blocking_section();
  94.     retcode = sync_mutex_lock(mut);
  95.     caml_leave_blocking_section();
  96.     sync_check_error(retcode, "Mutex.lock");
  97.   }
  98.   CAMLreturn(Val_unit);
  99. }

  101. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_mutex_unlock(value wrapper)
  102. {
  103.   sync_retcode retcode;
  104.   sync_mutex mut = Mutex_val(wrapper);
  105.   /* PR#4351: no need to release and reacquire master lock */
  106.   retcode = sync_mutex_unlock(mut);
  107.   sync_check_error(retcode, "Mutex.unlock");
  108.   return Val_unit;
  109. }

  111. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_mutex_try_lock(value wrapper)
  112. {
  113.   sync_mutex mut = Mutex_val(wrapper);
  114.   sync_retcode retcode;
  115.   retcode = sync_mutex_trylock(mut);
  116.   if (retcode == MUTEX_ALREADY_LOCKED) return Val_false;
  117.   sync_check_error(retcode, "Mutex.try_lock");
  118.   return Val_true;
  119. }

  121. /* Condition variables operations */

  123. ‌static void caml_condition_finalize(value wrapper)
  124. {
  125.   sync_condvar_destroy(Condition_val(wrapper));
  126. }

  128. ‌static int caml_condition_compare(value wrapper1, value wrapper2)
  129. {
  130.   sync_condvar cond1 = Condition_val(wrapper1);
  131.   sync_condvar cond2 = Condition_val(wrapper2);
  132.   return cond1 == cond2 ? 0 : cond1 < cond2 ? -1 : 1;
  133. }

  135. ‌static intnat caml_condition_hash(value wrapper)
  136. {
  137.   return (intnat) (Condition_val(wrapper));
  138. }

  140. ‌static struct custom_operations caml_condition_ops = {
  141.   "_condition",
  142.   caml_condition_finalize,
  143.   caml_condition_compare,
  144.   caml_condition_hash,
  145.   custom_serialize_default,
  146.   custom_deserialize_default,
  147.   custom_compare_ext_default,
  148.   custom_fixed_length_default
  149. };

  151. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_condition_new(value unit)
  152. {
  153.   value wrapper;
  154.   sync_condvar cond = NULL;

  156.   sync_check_error(sync_condvar_create(&cond), "Condition.create");
  157.   wrapper = caml_alloc_custom(&caml_condition_ops, sizeof(sync_condvar *),
  158.                               0, 1);
  159.   Condition_val(wrapper) = cond;
  160.   return wrapper;
  161. }

  163. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_condition_wait(value wcond, value wmut)
  164. {
  165.   CAMLparam2(wcond, wmut);
  166.   sync_condvar cond = Condition_val(wcond);
  167.   sync_mutex mut = Mutex_val(wmut);
  168.   sync_retcode retcode;

  170.   CAML_EV_BEGIN(EV_DOMAIN_CONDITION_WAIT);
  171.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  172.   retcode = sync_condvar_wait(cond, mut);
  173.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  174.   sync_check_error(retcode, "Condition.wait");
  175.   CAML_EV_END(EV_DOMAIN_CONDITION_WAIT);

  177.   CAMLreturn(Val_unit);
  178. }

  180. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_condition_signal(value wrapper)
  181. {
  182.   sync_check_error(sync_condvar_signal(Condition_val(wrapper)),
  183.                  "Condition.signal");
  184.   return Val_unit;
  185. }

  187. ‌CAMLprim value caml_ml_condition_broadcast(value wrapper)
  188. {
  189.   sync_check_error(sync_condvar_broadcast(Condition_val(wrapper)),
  190.                  "Condition.broadcast");
  191.   return Val_unit;
  192. }
